title: A$AP Rocky Brawlin' in the Streets & Fightin' in Court
description:
A$AP Rocky is more than just Rihanna’s baby daddy! He is a critically acclaimed rapper and fashionista. But, he also happens to have a number of legal issues, especially when it comes to fighting people in the streets. He’s been charged with assault several times, with one incident landing him in a Swedish jail and another ending in him being arrested at LAX after vacationing with Rihanna. Tune in as we break down all of his assault charges.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
